name: GOLAirlines
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: goal airlines
Developer Terms of Use
des:
About to board on a new flight? Alexa answers your questions about flight status, baggage, documents and more. Activate the GOL Airlines skill and prepare for you flight more easily. 

How to use: 

First you have to activate the skill. 

Then say: "Alexa, open GOL Airlines". From then on, you'll be able to ask about the status of a flight that will take off today or tomorrow and ask questions on a variety of topics.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
